content: And so right now, our forecast is that we're not going to put a lot of capital in and there's not going to be kind of a huge amount of EBITDA growth I think we'll all be happy if instead of having to invest $30 million or $40 million of inventory, we have to invest $100 million, because the incremental $60 million or $70 million probably generated another $20 million to $25 million of EBITDA.
